title: Sim Tower
description:
*******************************************************************************
                                   Sim Tower
*******************************************************************************

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                              General Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type.................: Game
Platform.............: Windows 9x/ME/2000
Part Size............: 14.3(mb)
Number of Parts......: 1
Compression Format...: RAR
File Validation......: SFV

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The 1995 Sim Tower. The goal of the game is to build a 110 floor tower 
containing offices, condos, resturants, parking, cinemas, a metro station and
many more items.

Serve your guests with security stations, hospitals, room service,lobbys, 
parking spaces and lots of different places to spend money.

To achieve a 110 floor, 5 star tower, you need to meet the demands of the 
occupants within. Office workers need parking. Condo renters like restaurants 
nearby, and all people like entertainment and hate crowds.

Can you find the perfect layout to your tower to achieve a 5 star megastructure?

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Install Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1)Unrar
2)Install
3)Reach for the stars!

Note: This works fine on my windows xp pro 32bit box.  I don&#039;t know if it works 
on vista.  It&#039;s a tiny download so if you&#039;re interested just give it a download 
and post your results.
